entry.tran: 西鲱，黍鲱(产于欧洲的一种小海鱼，可食用)
entry.def: Sprats are very small European sea fish which can be eaten.

means.word_mean: 1. small fatty European fish; usually smoked or canned like sardines
2. small herring processed like a sardine
